source.3235290e:
This notebook contains the graphs about World Happiness Report that taken in 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, 2019 and finally 2020. I tried to plot some graphs that aimed to show correlation or no correlation between some features in every year with the correlation values.

Absolutely there is still so much to do with this data and I am plannig to expand this research. Hopefully it's useful.
